snippet.title: Seeking Adventure Trailer - Steam Next Fest Demo Available Now!
snippet.description:
We're so proud to announce our new game, Seeking Adventure! It's currently participating in Steam Next Fest and the demo is available to play RIGHT NOW! 

Seeking Adventure is a brand new search and find/hidden object game with a side serving of cozy RPG elements. Click things, find stuff, and complete quests and challenges in dozens of hand designed levels with text-less interweaving storylines.

Give it a test run for us and feel free to leave us feedback on our Discord: https://www.discord.gg/kindredgames

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3436560/Seeking_Adventure/
